title: Atomic Kinetic Energy - KE of individual atoms

content.question: A sample of an ideal gas is held at a constant temperature and pressure, and its atoms have average kinetic energy <math alttext="K" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>K</mi></math>. Which of the following correctly describes the kinetic energy of a single gas atom?

choices.label: Greater than or equal to <math alttext="K" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>K</mi></mstyle></math>
Less than or equal to <math alttext="K" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>K</mi></mstyle></math>
Greater than, equal to, or less than <math alttext="K" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>K</mi></mstyle></math>

content.answer: Greater than, equal to, or less than <math alttext="K" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>K</mi></mstyle></math>
